title: Rocket Boots
subtle: Science Fiction (fiction), 231 words, Level I (Grade 1), Lexile 320L
description: What happens when a little girl named Lupe finds a pair of rocket boots? Rocket Boots is a story about the adventures Lupe goes on with her new pair of boots and her encounter with the robot who is the owner of the boots. The book can be used to teach students how to identify cause-and-effect relationships to better understand the story as well as the proper use of quotation marks.
reviewWords: cheered, claws, metal, pinched, rocket, tired
comprehension: Cause and Effect                : Identify cause-and-effect relationships
grammar: Quotation Marks                : Recognize and use quotation marks
